servinfo.title: Electric Load Current Sensor Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine)

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Electric Load Current Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection (For J20 Engine)

s1.ptxt: Remove battery from vehicle referring to Battery Dismounting and Remounting .
Detach fuse box No.1 (1) from its bracket.
Disconnect connector from electric load current sensor.
Remove electric load current sensor (1) from fuse box No.1 (2).

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: Install battery referring to Battery Dismounting and Remounting .
